title: Any successful case studies of Attribution Modeling for Digital? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would check out the following links:  Webinar: Attribution Modeling for Digital SuccessDigital Attribution - models and how to talk about attribution to a...Multi-Channel Attribution: Definitions, Models and a Reality CheckAttribution Modeling for Digital Success: Webinar this Friday + Public WhitelistValuing Digital Marketing Channels with Attribution ModelsI don't personally know of any case studies or stories, but these resources should help.
Here is one quite good: Case Cognita Schools Data Integration | Attribution Modelling | Windsor Data Services
